title: Smother Lover
itunes:title: Smother Lover
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I am a 39 year old woman, dating a 45 year old man. We met a year ago and things started off fantastic and moved quickly. He is a very sensitive and emotional man who has no difficulty expressing his every emotion to me. After dating men that play games and aren’t serious about settling down with one woman, my boyfriend’s openness was refreshing. But now it’s proving to be way too much..............

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
